caption.p: Seasonal activity of West Nile virus in ( A) Coachella Valley and ( B) Los Angeles, Southern California summarized from 2003â€“2011. Graphs plot the total number of mosquito pools tested and positive for WNV per month. Mosquitoes were collected host-seeking at CO 2 traps or attempting oviposition at gravid female traps and therefore were reproductively active. Red arrows show months when there were no WNV positive pools.
